attributes.action: Force airlines to indicate during check-in where children seat on airplanes
attributes.additional_details: We, the travelers, frequent flyers and airline customers demand that all airlines operating flight in- and outbound of UK allow families with childrento check in early and that the airline indicate where children are seated, so a seat selection can be made by fellow travellers accordingly
attributes.background: This is not to oust families with children from aircraft of course but both parties should appreciate that while it is obvious that families with children can opt to seat anywhere, those wishing to spend the travel time in a relaxed environment should be given a chance to select a seat accordingly.

rejection.details:
It's about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

This would be for individual airlines for decide if they wished to change their seating policy. You may wish to make your suggestion directly to airlines.
